description: Creates a new private endpoint in any given Atlas organization

Id.description: The unique identifier of the private endpoint.

EndpointServiceName.description: Name of the AWS PrivateLink endpoint service. Atlas returns null while it is creating the endpoint service.

ErrorMessage.description: Error message pertaining to the AWS PrivateLink connection. Returns null if there are no errors.

InterfaceEndpoints.description: Unique identifiers of the interface endpoints in your VPC that you added to the AWS PrivateLink connection.

Status.description: Status of the AWS PrivateLink connection. Atlas returns one of the following

GroupId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.

VpcId.description: String Representing de Vcp ID (like: vpc-xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx )

SubnetId.description: Unique 24-hexadecimal digit string that identifies your project.
